metadata.title: CVE-2017-16827 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The aout_get_external_symbols function in aoutx.h in the Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils2.29.1, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (slurp_symtabinvalid free and application crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
